body:
### Steps to reproduce

```console
git checkout develop
spack install py-pyopencl
spack load py-pyopencl
```

### Error message

```console
$ python -c "import pyopencl"
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian11-x86_64/gcc-10.2.0/py-pyopencl-2020.2.2-hbwcjbcd2atqc4ycj56bpiowbrw3vuse/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pyopencl/__init__.py", line 23, in <module>
    import six
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'six'
```

### Information on your system

$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.17.1-1045-cd4aad7627
* **Python:** 3.9.2
* **Platform:** linux-debian11-sandybridge
* **Concretizer:** clingo


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: missing dependency: py-pyopencl depends on py-six
